items.badge_description: Cheers to another year of great beer! Raise a pint as we welcome 2017 and all the wonderful beer adventures it will bring!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!
Happy Hanukkah! May your eight nights of celebration be filled with friends, family, and the best thing of all, great craft beer!
So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.
